name: Take Me Home (itch) (CommanderShizzle, JasmineAlzayer, Rafif Kalantan)
name_original: Take Me Home (itch) (CommanderShizzle, JasmineAlzayer, Rafif Kalantan)
description:
'Take Me Home' is a light-hearted 2.5D narrative-driven stealth game, where you play as a reaper that's been locked out of hell after experiencing a change of heart and refusing to reap the soul of a young boy. Sneaking your way around the market by hiding and possessing the townspeople, you'll need to collect certain several items with which you can perform a spell that'll take you home, all the while avoiding the religious fanatics roaming around the town. This game was made by our team of three over 2 months, between October - December, 2021 as part of our MAs in Games Design.

CONTROLS:

  • A / D : move left / right
  • E / Q : dash left / right
  • F : hide / unhide / possess humans / enter potion shop
  • X : un-possess someone
  • R : search stalls
